name: 人参人 (Carrot Monster)
description:
Made for the Global Game Jam 2023 in Akihabara

Keyboard:

  • Arrow Keys/WASD - Move
  • Space - Jump
  • E - Pull/Throw/Water

Xbox Controller: 

  • Left Stick/D-Pad - Move 
  • A - Jump
  • X - Pull/Throw/Water 

Switch Pro Controller: 

  • Left Stick/D-Pad - Move
  • B - Jump
  • Y - Pull/Throw/Water 

Playstation Controller:

  • Left Stick/D-Pad - Move
  • X - Jump
  • Square - Pull/Throw/Water
